      public int getNumberColor(Bot bot, Colors color) throws WrongPlayerException
      Returns the number of cards of the specified color that the bot has.
      Parameters:
      bot - the bot whose cards are to be counted
      color - the color of the cards to be counted
      Returns:
      the number of cards of the specified color that the bot has
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerException - if the bot is not the current bot

    • takeMeeples

      public boolean takeMeeples(Bot bot, City city, Colors color) throws WrongPlayerException, PlayerSeenException
      Takes meeples for the specified bot.
      Parameters:
      bot - the bot taking the meeples
      city - the city from which the meeples are to be taken
      color - the color of the meeples to be taken
      Returns:
      true if the meeples were successfully taken, false otherwise
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerException - if the bot is not the current bot
      PlayerSeenException - if the player has already been seen

    • addWagonCard

      public boolean addWagonCard(Bot bot, WagonCard wagonCard) throws DeckEmptyException, WrongPlayerException
      Adds a wagon card to the specified bot's hand.
      Parameters:
      bot - the bot adding the wagon card
      wagonCard - the wagon card to be added
      Returns:
      true if the wagon card was successfully added, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DeckEmptyException - if the deck is empty
      WrongPlayerException - if the bot is not the current bot
